verses.verse: These are the words <WH1697> which Moses <WH4872> spoke <WH1696> to all Israel <WH3478> beyond <WH5676> the Jordan <WH3383> in the wilderness, <WH4057> in the Arabah <WH6160> over against <WH4136> Suph, <WH5489> between Paran, <WH6290> and Tophel, <WH8603> and Laban, <WH3837> and Hazeroth, <WH2698> and Dizahab. <WH1774>
It is eleven <WH259> days <WH3117>' journey from Horeb <WH2722> by the way <WH1870> of Mount <WH2022> Seir <WH8165> to Kadesh Barnea. <WH6947>

It happened in the fortieth <WH705> year, <WH8141> in the eleventh <WH6249> month, <WH2320> on the first <WH259> day of the month, <WH2320> that Moses <WH4872> spoke <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> according to all that Yahweh <WH3068> had given him in commandment to them; <WH6680>

after <WH310> he had struck <WH5221> Sihon <WH5511> the king <WH4428> of the Amorites, <WH567> who lived <WH3427> in Heshbon, <WH2809> and Og <WH5747> the king <WH4428> of Bashan, <WH1316> who lived <WH3427> in Ashtaroth, <WH6252> at Edrei. <WH154>
Beyond <WH5676> the Jordan, <WH3383> in the land <WH776> of Moab, <WH4124> began <WH2974> Moses <WH4872> to declare <WH874> this law, <WH8451> saying, <WH559>
"Yahweh <WH3068> our God <WH430> spoke <WH1696> to us in Horeb, <WH2722> saying, <WH559> You have lived <WH3427> long enough <WH7227> in this mountain: <WH2022>

turn, <WH6437> and take your journey, <WH5265> and go <WH935> to the hill <WH2022> country of the Amorites, <WH567> and to all the places near <WH7934> there, <WH6160> in the Arabah, in the hill <WH2022> country, <WH8219> and in the lowland, and in the South, <WH5045> and by the <WH3220> seashore, <WH2348> the land <WH776> of the Canaanites, <WH3669> and Lebanon, <WH3844> as far as the great <WH1419> river, <WH5104> the river <WH5104> Euphrates. <WH6578>

Behold, <WH7200> I have set <WH5414> the land <WH776> before <WH6440> you: <WH935> go in and possess <WH3423> the land <WH776> which Yahweh <WH3068> swore <WH7650> to your fathers, <WH1> to Abraham, <WH85> to Isaac, <WH3327> and to Jacob, <WH3290> to give <WH5414> to them and to their seed <WH2233> after them. <WH310>"
I spoke <WH559> to you at that time, <WH6256> saying, <WH559> "I am not able <WH3201> to bear <WH5375> you myself alone: <WH905>
Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> has multiplied <WH7235> you, <WH3117> and behold, you are this day as the stars <WH3556> of the sky <WH8064> for multitude. <WH7230>
Yahweh, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of your fathers, <WH1> make you a thousand <WH505> times <WH6471> as many as <WH3254> you are, <WH1288> and bless you, <WH1696> as he has promised you!
How <WH349> can I myself alone bear <WH5375> your encumbrance, <WH2960> and your burden, <WH4853> and your strife? <WH7379>
Take <WH3051> wise <WH2450> men <WH582> of understanding <WH995> and well known <WH3045> according to your tribes, <WH7626> and I will make <WH7760> them heads over you. <WH7218>"
You answered <WH6030> me, <WH559> and said, "The thing <WH1697> which you have spoken <WH559> is good <WH2896> to do. <WH6213>"

So I took <WH3947> the heads <WH7218> of your tribes, <WH7626> wise <WH2450> men, <WH582> and known, <WH3045> and made <WH5414> them heads <WH7218> over you, <WH8269> captains of thousands, <WH505> and captains <WH8269> of hundreds, <WH3967> and captains <WH8269> of fifties, <WH2572> and captains <WH8269> of tens, <WH6235> and officers, <WH7860> according to your tribes. <WH7626>

I commanded <WH6680> your judges <WH8199> at that time, <WH6256> saying, <WH559> "Hear <WH8085> cases between your brothers, <WH251> and judge <WH8199> righteously <WH6664> between a man <WH376> and his brother, <WH251> and the foreigner who is living with him. <WH1616>

You shall not show <WH6440> partiality <WH5234> in judgment; <WH4941> you shall hear <WH8085> the small <WH6996> and the great <WH1419> alike; <WH1481> you shall not be afraid of the face <WH6440> of man; <WH376> for the judgment <WH4941> is God <WH430>'s. The case <WH1697> that is too hard <WH7185> for you, <WH7126> you shall bring to me, <WH8085> and I will hear it."
I commanded <WH6680> you at that time <WH6256> all the things <WH1697> which you should do. <WH6213>

We traveled <WH5265> from Horeb, <WH2722> and went through <WH3212> all that great <WH1419> and terrible <WH3372> wilderness <WH4057> which you saw, <WH7200> by the way <WH1870> to the hill <WH2022> country of the Amorites, <WH567> as Yahweh <WH3068> our God <WH430> commanded <WH6680> us; <WH935> and we came to Kadesh Barnea. <WH6947>
I said <WH559> to you, <WH935> "You have come to the hill <WH2022> country of the Amorites, <WH567> which Yahweh <WH3068> our God <WH430> gives to us. <WH5414>

Behold, <WH7200> Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> has set <WH5414> the land <WH776> before <WH6440> you: <WH5927> go up, take possession, <WH3423> as Yahweh, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of your fathers, <WH1> has spoken <WH1696> to you; <WH3372> don't be afraid, neither be dismayed. <WH2865>"

You came near <WH7126> to me everyone of you, <WH559> and said, "Let us send <WH7971> men <WH582> before <WH6440> us, <WH2658> that they may search the land <WH776> for us, <WH7725> and bring us word <WH1697> again <WH7725> of the way <WH1870> by which we must go up, <WH5927> and the cities <WH5892> to which we shall come. <WH935>"
The thing <WH1697> pleased me well; <WH3190> and I took <WH3947> twelve <WH8147> men <WH582> of you, <WH259> one man <WH582> for every tribe: <WH376>
and they turned <WH6437> and went up <WH5927> into the hill <WH2022> country, <WH935> and came to the valley <WH5158> of Eshcol, <WH812> and spied it out. <WH7270>

They took <WH3947> of the fruit <WH6529> of the land <WH776> in their hands, <WH3027> and brought it down <WH3381> to us, <WH7725> and brought us word <WH1697> again, <WH7725> and said, <WH559> "It is a good <WH2896> land <WH776> which Yahweh <WH3068> our God <WH430> gives to us. <WH5414>"
Yet you wouldn't <WH14> go up, <WH5927> but rebelled <WH4784> against the commandment <WH6310> of Yahweh <WH3068> your God: <WH430>

and you murmured <WH7279> in your tents, <WH168> and said, <WH559> "Because Yahweh <WH3068> hated <WH8135> us, <WH3318> he has brought us forth out of the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> to deliver <WH5414> us into the hand <WH3027> of the Amorites, <WH567> to destroy us. <WH8045>

Where are we going up? <WH5927> our brothers <WH251> have made our heart <WH3824> to melt, <WH4549> saying, <WH559> <WH5971> 'The people are greater <WH1419> and taller <WH7311> than we; <WH5892> the cities are great <WH1419> and fortified up <WH1219> to the sky; <WH8064> and moreover we have seen <WH7200> the sons <WH1121> of the Anakim there. <WH6062>'"
Then I said <WH559> to you, <WH6206> "Don't dread, neither be afraid of them. <WH3372>
Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> who goes <WH1980> before <WH6440> you, <WH3898> he will fight for you, <WH6213> according to all that he did for you in Egypt <WH4714> before your eyes, <WH5869>

and in the wilderness, <WH4057> where you have seen <WH7200> how that Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> bore <WH5375> you, <WH376> as a man does bear <WH5375> his son, <WH1121> in all the way <WH1870> that you went, <WH1980> until you came <WH935> to this place. <WH4725>"
Yet in this thing <WH1697> you didn't <WH539> believe Yahweh <WH3068> your God, <WH430>

who went <WH1980> before <WH6440> you in the way, <WH1870> to seek you out <WH8446> a place <WH4725> to pitch your tents <WH2583> in, <WH784> in fire by night, <WH3915> to show <WH7200> you by what way <WH1870> you should go, <WH3212> and in the cloud <WH6051> by day. <WH3119>
Yahweh <WH3068> heard <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of your words, <WH1697> and was angry, <WH7107> and swore, <WH7650> saying, <WH559>

"Surely not one <WH376> of these men <WH582> of this evil <WH7451> generation <WH1755> shall see <WH7200> the good <WH2896> land, <WH776> which I swore <WH7650> to give <WH5414> to your fathers, <WH1>

except <WH2108> Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh: <WH3312> he shall see <WH7200> it; <WH5414> and to him will I give the land <WH776> that <WH834> he has trodden on, <WH1869> and to his children, <WH1121> because he has wholly <WH4390> followed <WH310> Yahweh. <WH3068>"
Also Yahweh <WH3068> was angry <WH599> with me for your sakes, <WH1558> saying, <WH559> "You also shall not go <WH935> in there: <WH8033>

Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun, <WH5126> who stands <WH5975> before <WH6440> you, <WH935> he shall go in there: <WH2388> encourage you him; <WH3478> for he shall cause Israel to inherit it. <WH5157>

Moreover your little ones, <WH2945> whom you said <WH559> should be a prey, <WH957> and your children, <WH1121> who this day <WH3117> have no knowledge <WH3045> of good <WH2896> or evil, <WH7451> they shall go in <WH935> there, <WH5414> and to them will I give it, <WH3423> and they shall possess it.
But as for you, <WH6437> turn, and take your journey <WH5265> into the wilderness <WH4057> by the way <WH1870> to the Red <WH5488> Sea. <WH3220>"

Then you answered <WH6030> and said <WH559> to me, <WH2398> "We have sinned against Yahweh, <WH3068> we will go up <WH5927> and fight, <WH3898> according to all that Yahweh <WH3068> our God <WH430> commanded <WH6680> us. <WH376>" Every man of you put <WH2296> on his weapons <WH3627> of war, <WH4421> and presumed <WH1951> to go up <WH5927> into the hill country. <WH2022>

Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to me, <WH559> "Tell them, <WH5927> 'Don't go up, neither fight; <WH3898> for I am not among <WH7130> you; <WH5062> lest you be struck before <WH6440> your enemies. <WH341>'"

So I spoke <WH1696> to you, <WH8085> and you didn't listen; but you rebelled <WH4784> against the commandment <WH6310> of Yahweh, <WH3068> and were presumptuous, <WH2102> and went <WH5927> up <WH5927> into the hill country. <WH2022>

The Amorites, <WH567> who lived <WH3427> in that hill <WH2022> country, <WH3318> came out against <WH7125> you, <WH7291> and chased you, <WH1682> as bees do, <WH6213> and beat <WH3807> you down in Seir, <WH8165> even to Hormah. <WH2767>
You returned <WH7725> and wept <WH1058> before <WH6440> Yahweh; <WH3068> but Yahweh <WH3068> didn't <WH8085> listen to your voice, <WH6963> nor gave ear to you. <WH238>
So you stayed <WH3427> in Kadesh <WH6946> many <WH7227> days, <WH3117> according to the days <WH3117> that you remained. <WH3427>
